pageContext.claim: “What we did yesterday because that's one of the great environmental bills [the Great American Outdoors Act], and beyond that, ever signed since, well, I guess over a hundred years.”
pageContext.analysis: The Great American Outdoors Act Trump signed was hailed as the most important land conservation bills in years, providing funding for national parks, but it does nothing on climate change and it's an exaggeration to call it the greatest environmental bill in 100 years.
